name: NETXP LINUX High Volume Events - Root Command Executions
description: Monitors command executions with root privileges (euid=0), excluding system-related activities. Detection of root command executions helps in monitoring potential privilege escalation attempts.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "rootcmd" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
